Top = 0 Left = 0 Height = 504 Width = 960 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "MOD CATEGORIES" mr_iguid = .F. mr_categoryid = -1 uniqueid = A2C40FAAC07848A6AAF7217783F34B60 Name = "MR_MODS_CATEGORIES" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
local iguid
if not empty(thisform.p1)
thisform.mr_iguid = thisform.p1
else
thisform.mr_iguid = _inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', '00000000')
endif
thisform.mr_setinstance()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setinstance *!* mr_setinstance
if thisform.mr_iguid = '00000000' and reccount('mr_instances') > 0 then
go top in 'mr_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = mr_instances.iguid
endif
if seek(thisform.mr_iguid, 'mr_instances', 'iguid') = .t.
if empty(mr_instances.iname) then
thisform.caption = 'MOD CATEGORIES - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 240)
else
thisform.caption = 'MOD CATEGORIES - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iname, 240)
endif
select 'mr_mods_categories'
do case
case thisform.mr_categoryid = -1
set filter to mr_mods_categories.iguid = thisform.mr_iguid
otherwise
set filter to mr_mods_categories.categoryid = thisform.mr_categoryid and mr_mods_categories.iguid = thisform.mr_iguid
endcase
go top in 'mr_mods_categories'
else
thisform.setall('ENABLED', .f.)
thisform.tbinstances.enabled = .t.
thisform.caption = 'LOG - NO INSTANCE SELECTED'
endif
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui local icaption, sep
if seek(mr_mods_categories.aid, 'mr_addons', 'aid') = .t.
thisform.imgavatar.pictureval = mr_addons.avatar
else
thisform.imgavatar.pictureval = ''
endif
m.sep = space(3)
m.icaption = ' ' + ; 'GUID: ' + mr_instances.iguid + m.sep + ; 'NAME: ' + mr_instances.iname + m.sep + ; 'VERSION ' + mr_instances.iminecraft + m.sep + ; 'LOADER: ' + mr_instances.iloader + m.sep + ; 'MINVER: ' + mr_instances.gver1 + m.sep + ; 'MAXVER: ' + mr_instances.gver2 + m.sep + ; 'PATH: '
m.icaption = m.icaption + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 255 - len(m.icaption))
thisform.lblinstance.caption = m.icaption
ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 7 Top = 324 Width = 780 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Height = 276 Left = 12 RecordSource = "mr_mods_categories" TabIndex = 6 Top = 36 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange LPARAMETERS nColIndex
thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 348 Caption = "EXPORT" TabIndex = 4 ToolTipText = "EXPORT TO MODROBOT\EXPORT FOLDER" Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local cfile
m.cfile = _getapppath() + 'export'
if not directory(m.cfile, 1)
mkdir(m.cfile)
endif
m.cfile = m.cfile + '\' + ttoc(datetime(), 1) + '.xml'
thisform.gridmain.datatoexcelxlm(m.cfile, .t.) ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 840 Height = 28 Width = 108 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "OVERVIEW" TabIndex = 5 ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT OVERVIEW URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods_categories.aid > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject(mr_mods_categories.aid))
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 204 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_autorenew_black_18dp.png Caption = "SCAN" TabIndex = 3 ToolTipText = "SCAN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbscan"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click go bottom in 'mr_mods_categories'
if not eof('mr_mods_categories')
skip 1 in 'mr_mods_categories'
endif
do mr_categories_update_mods.prg with thisform.mr_iguid
go top in 'mr_mods_categories'
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 108 Height = 28 Width = 84 Caption = "CATEGORY" TabIndex = 2 Name = "_tbdropdown1"
Top = 0 Left = 12 Caption = "INSTANCES" TabIndex = 1 ToolTipText = "INSTANCES" Name = "tbinstances"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
do form mr_instances ENDPROC PROCEDURE dropdownclick Local iguid, nselect, result
m.nselect = select()
use 'mr_instances' again in 0 order tag 'INAME' alias 'menu_instances'
select 'menu_instances'
scan
this.tbmenuitemadd(recno('menu_instances'), 0, 0, 0, 0, menu_instances.iname + ' - ' + menu_instances.ifolder)
endscan
m.result = this.tbmenushow()
if m.result > 0 then
go m.result in 'menu_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = menu_instances.iguid
endif
use in 'menu_instances'
_restorearea(m.nselect)
if m.result > 0 then
thisform.mr_categoryid = -1
thisform.mr_setinstance()
endif ENDPROC
